tool.name: RECETOX xMSannotator advanced
tool.description: annotate peak intensity table including scores and confidence levels

configfiles.configfile:
peak_table <- create_peak_table("$metadata_table", "$intensity_table")
filter_by <- create_filter_by_adducts("$filter_by")
annotation <- advanced_annotation( peak_table = peak_table, adduct_table = load_adduct_table("$adduct_table"), adduct_weights = load_table("$adduct_weights"), compound_table = load_compound_table_parquet("$compound_table"), mass_tolerance = 1e-6 * ${mass_tolerance_ppm}, time_tolerance = $time_tolerance, correlation_threshold = as.double($clustering.correlation_threshold), min_cluster_size = as.integer($clustering.min_cluster_size), deep_split = as.integer($clustering.deep_split), network_type = "$clustering.network_type", redundancy_filtering = $scoring.redundancy_filtering, n_workers = n_workers, intensity_deviation_tolerance = as.double($intensity_deviation_tolerance), mass_defect_tolerance = as.double($mass_defect_tolerance), mass_defect_precision = as.double($mass_defect_precision), peak_rt_width = as.integer($peak_rt_width), maximum_isotopes = as.integer($maximum_isotopes), min_ions_per_chemical = as.integer($min_ions_per_chemical), filter_by = filter_by )
arrow::write_parquet(annotation, "$annotation_parquet")

param.name: time_tolerance
param.label: Retention time tolerance [s]
param.help: Retention time tolerance in seconds for finding peaks derived from the same parent compound.

param.name: correlation_threshold
param.label: Correlation threshold
param.help: Correlation threshold between peaks to qualify as adducts/isotopes of the same metabolite.

param.name: min_cluster_size
param.label: Minimum cluster size
param.help: The minimum number of nodes to be considered as a cluster.

param.name: deep_split
param.label: Deep split
param.help: Deep split provides a rough control over sensitivity to cluster splitting. The higher the value, the more and smaller clusters will be produced (see WGCNA package documentation).

param.name: network_type
param.label: Network type
param.help: Network type parameter affects how the network's adjacency matrix is created from the correlation matrix (see WGCNA package documentation).

param.name: strict_boosting
param.label: Strict boosting
param.help: Boost the scores of metabolites that not only belongs to the same pathway but also to the same cluster. Otherwise, do not account for cluster membership.

param.name: min_isp
param.label: Minimum number of expected isotopes
param.help: Minimum number of adducts/isotopes to be present for a match to be considered as a high confidence match.

param.name: max_isp
param.label: Maximum number of expected isotopes
param.help: Maximum number of adducts/isotopes to be present for a match to be considered as a high confidence match.

param.name: redundancy_filtering
param.label: Redundancy filtering
param.help: Whether to filter out low-scored multiple matcher or not.

param.name: intensity_deviation_tolerance
param.label: Tolerance of intensity deviation
param.help: A numeric threshold by which an intensity ratio of two isotopic peaks may differ from their actual abundance ratio.

param.name: mass_defect_tolerance
param.label: Tolerance of mass defect
param.help: Maximum difference in mass defect between two peaks of the same compound.
